questions.question: How many team members can I invite?
questions.ans: You can invite up to 2 additional users on the Free plan. There is no limit on team members for the Premium plan.

questions.question: What is the maximum file upload size?
questions.ans: No more than 2GB. All files in your account must fit your allotted storage space.

questions.question: How do I reset my password?
questions.ans: Click “Forgot password” from the login page or “Change password” from your profile page. A reset link will be emailed to you.

questions.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
questions.ans: Yes! Send us a message and we’ll process your request no questions asked.

questions.question: Do you provide addtional support?
questions.ans: Chat and email support is available 24/7. Phone lines are open during normal business hours.
